name: Ricetta: gamberetti al curry
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Curry Shrimp.

value.name: Gamberetti
value.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

value.name: Cipolla
value.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

value.name: Spezie
value.desc: A seasoning with varied flavors. It is made from dried Harra Fruits and can enrich the taste of a dish. Therefore, Sumeru locals say, "Spice goes well with anything."

value.name: Gamberetti al curry
value.desc: A common household dish in Sumeru. The shrimps are first boiled until chewy, then added into the curry broth. The perfect blend of savory curry and flavors from the ocean is enough to make one's stomach growl. Though it's a common household dish, almost every family seems to have made their own variations to the recipe. Perhaps one could say that for every Sumeru household, there'll be a different version of curry shrimp.

value.text: Purchase from Jahangir in Port Ormos
